type.name: org.gradle.plugins.ide.eclipse.model.EclipseClasspath

method.name: resolveDependencies
method.description: Calculates, resolves and returns dependency entries of this classpath.

method.name: getDefaultOutputDir
method.description:
The default output directory where Eclipse puts compiled classes.

See EclipseClasspath for an example.

method.name: isDownloadSources
method.description:
Whether to download and associate source Jars with the dependency Jars. Defaults to true.

See EclipseClasspath for an example.

method.name: file
method.description:
Enables advanced configuration like tinkering with the output XML or affecting the way that the contents of an existing .classpath file is merged with Gradle build information. The object passed to the whenMerged{} and beforeMerged{} closures is of type Classpath.

See EclipseProject for an example.

method.name: getContainers
method.description:
The classpath containers to be added.

See EclipseClasspath for an example.

method.name: containers
method.description:
Further classpath containers to be added.

See EclipseClasspath for an example.
param:containers the classpath containers to be added

method.name: getSourceSets
method.description:
The source sets to be added.

See EclipseClasspath for an example.

method.name: getMinusConfigurations
method.description:
The configurations whose files are to be excluded from the classpath entries.

See EclipseClasspath for an example.

method.name: isDownloadJavadoc
method.description:
Whether to download and associate Javadoc Jars with the dependency Jars. Defaults to false.

See EclipseClasspath for an example.

method.name: getPlusConfigurations
method.description:
The configurations whose files are to be added as classpath entries.

See EclipseClasspath for an example.

property.name: sourceSets
property.description:
The source sets to be added.

See EclipseClasspath for an example.

property.name: downloadJavadoc
property.description:
Whether to download and associate Javadoc Jars with the dependency Jars. Defaults to false.

See EclipseClasspath for an example.

property.name: containers
property.description:
The classpath containers to be added.

See EclipseClasspath for an example.

property.name: plusConfigurations
property.description:
The configurations whose files are to be added as classpath entries.

See EclipseClasspath for an example.

property.name: minusConfigurations
property.description:
The configurations whose files are to be excluded from the classpath entries.

See EclipseClasspath for an example.

property.name: downloadSources
property.description:
Whether to download and associate source Jars with the dependency Jars. Defaults to true.

See EclipseClasspath for an example.

property.name: defaultOutputDir
property.description:
The default output directory where Eclipse puts compiled classes.

See EclipseClasspath for an example.
